oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Then conquer we must
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter by Jacob J. Burnett on Federal stationery with the following quote: "Then conquer we must, when our cause it is just, and this be our motto -'In god is our trust,' " taken from fourth stanza of the Star-Spangled Banner. Above the quote is a woman holding wheat with her other hand on a shield.

In 1861, Jacob J. Burnett enlisted in the Civil War as a Federal soldier. After suffering wounds in mid-1862, he was hospitalized in the U. S. General Hospital in West Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, for several months before returning to Indiana.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865
Stationery; Letterheads
